**Apple stock analysis**

Apple is the biggest company by market value. Here is the chart.

```{r}
#| echo: false
#| output: false
library(tidyquant)
```

```{r}
#| echo: false
#| output: false
getSymbols("AAPL", from = '2017-01-01',
           to = "2027-03-01",warnings = FALSE,
           auto.assign = TRUE)

```

```{r}
chart_Series(AAPL)
```
